content.rendered:
The Executive Vice President of TTE, Dilip Sharma, accompanied Eng. Faisal Alsarkal, Director of the Water Department, and Eng. Mohamed Almheiri, Sharjah Electricity, Water and Gas Authority (SEWA), on a factory visit and test inspection at Diehl Metering earlier this month.

During the visit to the factory in Ansbach, the team received an overview of the roadmap for Meters & Connectivity, and participated in the sample selection of HYDRUS 2.0, a static ultrasonic water meter designed for domestic cold-water supply applications, enabling accurate measurements over the long term under challenging conditions. At the DIEHL Metering headquarters in Nuremberg, a presentation on MIOTY®, a unique wireless communication protocol created to address the limitations of other Low-Power Wide-Area Network (LPWAN) solutions, was followed by an insightful discussion with the DIEHL Metering team.

Maya Ayoub, Sales & Business Development Manager, Ali Badran, Head of Customer Solution Center Middle East Region, DIEHL Metering FZE, and Syed Raza, Senior Sales Manager, TTE Products & Solutions, accompanied the distinguished guests from SEWA.

TTE values its partnership with DIEHL Metering, contributing to enhanced efficiency, reduced costs, and the conservation of natural resources in water & energy networks.
